messages.content:
You are a Google Drive data generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to generate realistic Drive file data based on scenario information.

The output must be valid JSON matching the Drive schema with:
- files: array of {id, name, mimeType (optional), content (optional text excerpt), modifiedTime (optional)}

Generate Drive files that reflect:
- Events from sub_scenarios_expanded (core scenario events, e.g., documents, reports)
- Events from noise_scenarios (unrelated workplace files)
- Respect noise_level: 0 = minimal noise, 1 = lots of unrelated files
- Respect depth: 0 = direct/obvious files, 1 = indirect/multi-step file references

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

raw_message.content:
{
  "files": [
    {
      "id": "file_WEB-101_meeting_notes_template",
      "name": "WEB-101 Planning Meeting - Agenda & Notes",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-19T09:25:00+09:00",
      "content": "WEB-101 Planning Meeting - Website Redesign Core Feature

Date: 2025-11-25
Time: 11:00–11:45 (Asia/Tokyo)
Location: Zoom

Attendees:
- Alex Smith (PM, reporter on WEB-101)
- Jordan Johnson (Engineering, assignee on WEB-101)
- Sam Williams (Senior Engineer)

Jira Issue: WEB-101 - Website Redesign - Core Feature
Status: In Progress

Meeting Objectives:
- Align PM, Engineering, and Design on scope, UX flows, and technical constraints before development proceeds.

Agenda (from calendar event):
1) Review current requirements in WEB-101
2) Confirm MVP scope vs. stretch goals
3) Discuss technical feasibility and dependencies
4) Define next steps and owners

Proposed Discussion Points:
- Scope clarification
- UX flows and edge cases
- Timeline and milestones relative to project dates (Planning: 2025-11-10, Development: 2025-11-20, Launch: 2025-11-30)

Notes:
- To be filled in during the 2025-11-25 session.
"
    },
    {
      "id": "file_WEB-101_time_slot_draft",
      "name": "WEB-101 Planning Session - Proposed Time Slots",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.spreadsheet",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-19T09:21:00+09:00",
      "content": "Context: Per Jira issue WEB-101 and follow-up emails, Alex needs to propose 45-minute planning slots next week in Asia/Tokyo working hours for Alex, Jordan, and Sam.

Working hours considered: 08:00–19:00 (Asia/Tokyo)
Week window: 2025-11-24 to 2025-11-28

Existing calendar events referenced:
- 2025-11-25 10:00–11:00: Engineering / Product Weekly Sync (Alex, Jordan)
- 2025-11-26 09:30–10:00: Product Standup (Jordan)
- 2025-11-27 14:00–15:00: Design Review - Homepage (Sam)

Proposed 45-minute slots that avoid conflicts:
1) Tuesday 11/25, 11:00–11:45
   - After the weekly sync; all three appear free.
2) Wednesday 11/26, 10:30–11:15
   - After Jordan’s standup; within working hours.
3) Thursday 11/27, 15:30–16:15
   - After Sam’s design review; within working hours.

These options are exactly the slots Alex listed in the email to Jordan and Sam on 2025-11-19.
"
    },
    {
      "id": "file_WEB-101_calendar_event_snapshot",
      "name": "WEB-101 Planning Meeting - Calendar Event Details",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-19T09:50:00+09:00",
      "content": "Calendar Event: WEB-101 Planning Meeting - Website Redesign Core Feature

Created by: Alex Smith (alex.smith@company.com)
Created at: 2025-11-19T09:50:00+09:00 (Asia/Tokyo)

Title: WEB-101 Planning Meeting - Website Redesign Core Feature
Start: 2025-11-25T11:00:00+09:00
End: 2025-11-25T11:45:00+09:00
Duration: 45 minutes
Location: Zoom

Participants:
- alex.smith@company.com
- jordan.johnson@company.com
- sam.williams@company.com

Description:
"45-minute planning session to align on scope, UX flows, and technical constraints for WEB-101 (Website Redesign - Core Feature).

Attendees: Alex Smith (PM), Jordan Johnson (Engineer), Sam Williams (Senior Engineer).

Agenda:
1) Review current requirements in WEB-101
2) Confirm MVP scope vs. stretch goals
3) Discuss technical feasibility and dependencies
4) Define next steps and owners"

Notes:
- Time was selected after email confirmations from Jordan and Sam that Tuesday 11/25, 11:00–11:45 works best.
- Fits within Asia/Tokyo working hours (08:00–19:00) for the week of 2025-11-24 to 2025-11-30.
"
    },
    {
      "id": "file_WEB_project_overview",
      "name": "Website Redesign (WEB) - Project Overview",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-18T18:00:00+09:00",
      "content": "Project: Website Redesign (WEB)

Key Milestones:
- Planning: 2025-11-10
- Development: 2025-11-20
- Launch: 2025-11-30

Related Jira Issues:
- WEB-100: Website Redesign - Initial Setup (Status: Done)
- WEB-101: Website Redesign - Core Feature (Status: In Progress)

WEB-101 Summary:
"Core feature implementation for the Website Redesign. Requires alignment between PM, Engineering, and Design on scope, UX flows, and technical constraints before development proceeds."

Upcoming Activities:
- Planning meeting for WEB-101 (45 minutes, early in the week of 2025-11-24, Asia/Tokyo working hours) between Alex (PM), Jordan (Engineering), and Sam (Senior Engineer).
"
    }
  ]
}
